pull.title: Debugtx2
pull.body: Add optional debugging for transactions, including processing "notfound" messages.

events.message: Improve askfor logging (show time it will be requested by)
Process "notfound" messages, and safeguard against unreasonably long ones.

events.body:
Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/p4815_db1a3bc2f10e7a81379c44042e730f94df51c0fb/ for binaries and test log.
This test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/current/
Contact BlueMatt on freenode if something looks broken.
Please don't just add a new P2P message type. That should go through a discussion on the mailing list.
@laanwj I've not added a new P2P message type.
Ok - I see it was added in 903d146. You just add a handler...
ACK once @laanwj 's feedback addressed.  NAK as-is.

comments.body: Like "reject", the handling for this message this should be surrounded by `if (fDebug)`, makes it extremely easy to flood the log of unsuspecting users otherwise - Or at least consume CPU by generating lots of messages and not logging them. It is just not necessary to parse this message at all if not debugging.
